attributes.action: open up an independent investigation  to decide the future of the BBC's fundinng
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ten years from now the BBC under its current model stand to lose a huge amount of revenu due to the internet competition.
However none of this internet competition owes us the public the sort of commitment the BBC does.
If we simply do nothing the BBC could go commercial and from there could go anywhere (split up, go bankcrupt you name it).
This would mean that we may lose out on an very valuable peice of the commons.

At the moment though all the options are not on the table and even if you do want the BBC to to go commercial is it not fair that we all get to decide.

This investigation should try to work out the following issues in relation to the BBC future.

What ideas the public have for the future structure.

What the public see as most valuable.

What options there are.

How the public sees the future of the BBC in their local community.

What do the people in the bbc want in relation to things they think are currently wrong with the BBC and their purposed solutions plus new ideas.

This investigation should last no less that one year and should get as a diverse a stand point as possible due to the nature of the world we're fast entering into.
